subtitle: HVY Nightshark
content:
GTA+ Members can claim the HVY Nightshark (off-road) and the rare Skulls livery for free through November 6.

If you canâ€™t make people love you, make them fear you from behind the wheel of the nefarious HVY Nightshark (Off-Road) decked out in the chilling Skulls livery. This SUV features dual machine guns and enough armor plating to withstand a small army.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
